description: Application under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for variation of conditions 4, 8, 9, 16 and 24 of planning permission P071734 issued 30/11/2007, to have the effect of varying the requirements for the timing of the submission of details pursuant to these conditions.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: (Variation to condition 24 of P071734) 
1) Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved, not later than three months after works commencing on site plans and details shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, addressing the front part of the site fronting Hornsey Lane.  The plan and supporting information shall address the following:
(a)	The layout of the vehicular entrance and exit and facilities for the loading and drop off and disabled pupils or visitors, and for short term parking only for disabled visitors, 
(b)	Details of the 'crocodile teeth' and the means by which they and the area would be managed so as to avoid a trip hazard arising, 
(c)	Landscaping at the front of the site,
(d)	Front boundary treatments, and    

2)  Notwithstanding the plans hereby approved, prior to final occupation of the building hereby approved fronting Hornsey Lane, plans and details such as an access and drop off management plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, addressing the front part of the site fronting Hornsey Lane.  The plan and supporting information shall address the following:
(a)	Details of any signage at the front entrance and details of the proposed intercom arrangement (or other access control mechanism) for controlling vehicular entry/exit
(b)	Management plan for restricting the use of the front part of the site for pedestrian and cyclist entry only and for allowing disabled drop off of visitors or pupils only.

REASON: In the interests of visual amenity and having regard to road safety.
